E-Mail Messages
Date: Friday, 5/23/1975
Subject: Extension?
Dear Sir,
I am really enjoying playing for your team.
I would be interested in a contract extension!
How about you?

Regards,
Rickey Clark



Date: Friday, 5/23/1975
Subject: Progress of Greg Heydeman
Dear Sir,
Greg Heydeman has nothing more to prove at AA Orlando Twins!
He has an ERA of 3.27 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt.

Regards,
Scouting Director
